Content: Under the guidance of the General Officer Commanding, 57 Division, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, 15 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) troops of the 573 Brigade conducted a Shramadana  at Waddakachchi School on Friday (14) under the supervision of the 573 Brigade Commander, Colonel Janaka Ranasinghe. More than 30 troops, together with civilians in the area contributed to this Shramadana campaign and cleaned the school premises and its surroundings.
